item.title: Data Narratives with R
item.description: Session 2: An Open-source Odyssey: Crafting Data Narratives with R **Introduction to Data Visualization Tools in R ** Resource Person : Dr. Priyanga D. Talagala

item.title: SmartPLS SEM Graph in Focus
item.description: Session 3: SmartPLS SEM Graph in Focus: Hypothesis Testing through Illustrative Designing Introduction to SmartPLS and Structural Equation Modeling Overview of the function and importance of SmartPLS; a brief explanation of Structural Equation Modeling (SEM), and its application in various domains.
